title: WSB's Weekend Bite Week Ending April 29: Recession Warnings
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: This week we discuss recession warnings, what this earnings season means for the market, and macro implications from Russia's continued invasion of Ukraine. With Eric Basmajian from EPB Macro Research, and Richard Hunter, Head of Markets at Interactive Investor.
content:encoded: This week we discuss recession warnings, what this earnings season means for the market, and macro implications from Russia's continued invasion of Ukraine. With Eric Basmajian from EPB Macro Research, and Richard Hunter, Head of Markets at Interactive Investor.
